alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 11:42AM EDT until May 12 at 3:12AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Covington, Montezuma, Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site, Terre Haute, Clinton, Riverton, and Lafayette. White River at Edwardsport and Elliston. .Recent rainfall will lead to minor flooding along the Wabash and Lower White Rivers in Indiana. Additional rainfall is expected over the next several days, bringing additional flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Covington. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, A few county roads begin to flood. Higher bottomlands begin to flood. The first cottage upstream from U.S. 136 bridge may become isolated by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Friday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 AM EDT Friday was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.6 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
